name: video-playback-speed
description: Free YouTube playback speed control - Chrome extension to bypass Premium speed restrictions. Also supports NRK TV. Control video speed with in-player button.
author: Markus Lund

scripts.package: npm run build && rm -rf chrome-store-package && mkdir -p chrome-store-package && cp manifest.json popup.html chrome-store-package/ && cp -r dist/ icons/ chrome-store-package/ && cd chrome-store-package && zip -r ../nrk-playback-speed-extension.zip . && cd .. && echo 'âœ… Extension packaged as nrk-playback-speed-extension.zip'
